parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ApsaraDB for Redis instance. You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~60933~~) operation to query instance IDs.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than **0**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **30**, **50**, and **100**.

>  Default value: **30**.
